game.s_dis: Vex 4 is a fast-paced stickman platformer where players run, jump, slide, and climb through deadly traps and challenging levels.
game.l_dis:
Vex 4 – Ultimate Stickman Obstacle Challenge

Vex 4 is a browser-based stickman platformer that pushes your reflexes and timing to the limit as you navigate through fast-paced levels filled with spikes, saw blades, and collapsing platforms.

What is Vex 4?

Vex 4 continues the thrilling stickman adventure with more complex levels, tighter jumps, and deadlier traps. Players must master running, jumping, sliding, and climbing to survive.

How to Play Vex 4?

  • Move & Jump: Use arrow keys or WASD to run, jump, and slide through hazards.
  • Climb & Navigate: Overcome walls and obstacles with precise timing.
  • Avoid Traps: Spikes, saws, and collapsing platforms require fast reflexes.
  • Challenge Yourself: Levels are designed to test skill, patience, and strategy.
  • Replay for Mastery: Repeat levels to perfect your runs and achieve faster times.

Why Play Vex 4 Unblocked?

Vex 4 Unblocked allows you to enjoy high-speed platforming anywhere in your browser without restrictions, perfect for quick sessions or marathon runs.

Key Features

  • Fast-Paced Platforming: React quickly to survive intricate obstacle layouts.
  • Deadly Traps: Spikes, saws, and collapsible floors challenge your skills.
  • Stickman Controls: Smooth and precise movement for running, jumping, sliding, and climbing.
  • Replayable Levels: Perfect your runs and compete for the best times.
  • Unblocked Access: Play directly in your browser anywhere, anytime.

Can You Survive Vex 4? ⚡

Test your reflexes and timing as you dash, jump, and slide through increasingly dangerous levels in Vex 4. Only the most skilled stickmen survive!
